headline: VICI Properties Expands Gaming Portfolio As Valuation Shows Potential Upside
summary: VICI Properties (NYSE:VICI) agreed to acquire seven gaming properties for about US$1.2b. The deal adds to VICI's portfolio of experiential real estate focused on gaming and entertainment. The transaction reflects the company’s continued use of large scale deals to grow its rent base. VICI Properties, traded on the NYSE under the ticker VICI, is a large experiential real estate owner focused on gaming, hospitality and entertainment properties. This latest US$1.2b acquisition of seven gaming...

headline: Is VICI Properties (VICI) Offering Value After Mixed Returns And REIT Headline Focus?
summary: If you are wondering whether VICI Properties is offering good value at its current price, it helps to first see how its recent share performance lines up with what you expect from a large casino and entertainment focused REIT. The stock closed at US$27.89, with returns of 1.7% decline over 7 days, 1.4% decline over 30 days, 0.9% decline year to date, 0.4% decline over 1 year, 4.6% decline over 3 years, and 35.9% over 5 years, which gives you a mixed picture across different...

headline: Why The VICI Properties (VICI) Story Is Shifting After The New Price Target Update
summary: The recent change in the price target for VICI Properties has put fresh attention on how investors are thinking about the stock right now. This shift reflects updated expectations based on the latest commentary around the company, its assets and its position in the real estate and gaming ecosystems. Stay with me as we walk through what is driving this new price target and how you can keep on top of future updates to the VICI story. Stay updated as the Fair Value for VICI Properties shifts by...
